title: First Glance ( NEW FACE )
content:
Hey everybody,

Looking for some general comments on these letters, I'm in the midst of solidifying my pencil drawings, this is what I have so far. I've actually got all the caps done, and the standard number set. Tentatively titled Northern OS.

Thanks in advance,

Eric

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [JIMLCEFDAB.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124123847/http:/typophile.com/files/JIMLCEFDAB.pdf) | 465.35 KB |
author: Eric_West

comments.content:
These letters are so rough, it looks too early to critique. Once you start making these letters digital is when the form really gets going. Your ascenders and overshoots will probably change some once you start digitizing.

BTW, Eric...I'm also originally from Cincinnati.

Eric:

Although it's an early stage you should consider **lowering the "M" inside vertex** and **shortening the "F" horizontal bar**. It shure has nice balanced proportions though. Keep it up!

Cheers
